sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import firebase from "../../firebase/firebase" export const Excel = () => { const [profesionales, setProfesionales] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { firebase.db.collection("profesionales").onSnapshot(querySnapshot => { const data = [] querySnapshot.docs.forEach(doc => { const { name, id } = doc.data() data.push({ id: doc.id, name }) }) setProfesionales(data) }) }, []) const guardarMontos = (value, id) => { const monto = {monto: value} const foundIndex = profesionales.findIndex(item => item.id === id) const obj = profesionales[foundIndex] const newObj = Object.assign(obj, monto) setProfesionales(profesionales.splice(foundIndex, 1, newObj )) } console.log(profesionales) return
MONTO
IIBB
%CIRC
CIRC/ALQ
BCO
TOTAL
{profesionales.map(item =>
{item.name}
guardarMontos(e.target.value, item.id)} />
)}
}
